# Exponential

> Exponential distribution.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var exponential = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dist/exponential' );
```

#### exponential

Exponential distribution.

```javascript
var dist = exponential;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
